dublin_core.dcvalue: Are portable and or cell phones too risky to use in hemodialysis units How can electromagnetic interference affect the equipment Is there a real concern for health care workers and patients This article offers answers to the above questions as well as reviews the different recommendations and guidelines from the Canadian Standards Association CSA and the U S Food and Drug Administration FDA in order to formalize recommendations and help us make a decision
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-06T15:58:05Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2005-07-29
Portable phones in hemodialysis units: are we interfering?
